slides.title: Chandrayaan 3
slides.description: Chandrayaan-3 is India's third lunar exploration mission and the second attempt to make a soft landing on the lunar surface after the Chandrayaan-2 mission.

slides.title: Aditya-L1
slides.description: Aditya-L1 is India's first solar mission to study the Sun's corona and solar wind in detail from the L1 Lagrange point.

slides.title: Mangalyaan
slides.description: Mangalyaan, also known as the Mars Orbiter Mission (MOM), was India's first interplanetary mission, successfully reaching Mars orbit on September 24, 2014

slides.title: NavIC
slides.description: Navigation with Indian Constellation (NavIC) is India's regional satellite navigation system providing accurate positioning services.
